item.title: Challenge2021 - Amazon
item.description:
Contact info: Fernando Carazo fcarazo@tecnun.es 1 Department of Biomedical Engineering and Sciences, Tecnun. University of Navarre 2 Institute Of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence, University of Navarre
Introduction. Vehicle Routing Problem This yearâ€™s Challenge in the subject Arquitectura de Computadores II will be related to the delivery process of Amazon. In the Vehicle Routing Problem (VRP), the goal is to find optimal routes for multiple vehicles visiting a set of locations.
